power.title: Devastating Strike
power.fluff: You strike with awesome power, more concerned with offensive strength than defensive posturing

section.name: Raging:
section.text: You can reroll any damage die result of 1 until the die shows 2 or higher. For d10s and d12s, you can reroll any damage die result of 1 or 2 until the die shows a 3 or higher.
If you can already reroll the damage die, roll twice and take the higher result.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, attacks against you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

power.title: Foe to Foe
power.fluff: Slaying your foe fills you with the rush of battle, allowing you to cut your way from one foe to the next with greater ease

section.text: If you have reduced at least one non-minion enemy to 0 hit points during this encounter, this attack deals an additional 1d8 damage, or an additional 2d8 damage if you reduced a non-minion enemy to 0 hit points since the start of your previous turn.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and 3d8 or 4d8 additional damage.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While you are raging, when you reduce a minion enemy to 0 hit points, you can immediately move one-half your speed, but must end this move adjacent to an enemy. When you reduce a non-minion enemy to 0 hit points or less, you can immediately move your speed, but must end this move adjacent to an enemy.

power.title: Howl of Fury
power.fluff: You strike a hearty blow, then unleash an ear-splitting battle cry

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you make the howl attack. You must include the primary target in the howl attack's area.

section.name: Howl Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the blast, other than the primary target

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While you are raging, the primary target is also a howl target

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes thunder damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Howling Strike
power.fluff: With a blood-freezing scream, you throw yourself into the fray

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a melee weapon in two hands

section.name: Special:
section.text: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While raging, your speed increases by 2 squares when you charge and use howling strike.

power.title: Jarring Smash
power.fluff: You slam your weapon into your enemy, causing it to reel at the force of your blow

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a melee weapon in two hands

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While you are raging, you can target Fortitude instead

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Pressing Strike
power.fluff: You push lesser foes from your path, moving through the lines of battle at will

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to 2 squares. You can move through an enemy's space during the shift, but you can't end there.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While you are raging, you can shift 1 additional square.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While you are raging, you can push the target 1 additional square.

power.title: Recuperating Strike
power.fluff: Nothing raises your spirit more than slamming your weapon into a foe, each crushing swing giving you will to press on

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a melee weapon in two hands

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
If this attack reduces a non-minion enemy to 0 hit points or less, the power gains the Healing keyword and you regain hit points instead of gaining temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier + 1d6 damage, and 3 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points or healing.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier + 2d6 damage, and 6 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points or healing.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While you are raging, you gain an additional +5 temporary hit points or healing.

power.title: Run Down
power.fluff: You smash your enemy in a vulnerable place, slowing it and keeping it from escaping you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While you are raging, the target is also unable to shift while it remains slowed.

power.title: Savage Reach
power.fluff: Your great strength and the reach of your weapon allow you to smash enemies aside with each blow

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon
+2 to attack if the target is not adjacent to you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. If the target is adjacent to you, you can push it 2 squares instead.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier + 2d6 damage, and slide 2 squares or push 3 squares.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While you are raging, you increase the forced movement by 1 square.

power.title: Whirling Rend
power.fluff: You strike out in two directions, drawing blood from different enemies

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and an enemy adjacent to you other than the target takes 1[W] (off-hand) damage.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: While you are raging, you add your Dexterity modifier to both damage rolls.
